blocks.name: nn0gsumfz0
blocks.content: Replacing a finitely supported function over the nonnegative integers by a function over a finite set of sequential integers in a finite group sum. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0gsumfz0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c0, cmap, cn0)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), w3a(wceq(cv(s1), cres(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1)))))))
  nn0gsumfz(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c2, c3, c1, w0)
  reximi(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), w3a(wceq(cv(s1), cres(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1))))), wrex(s1, co(c0, cmap, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1)))))

  simp3(wceq(cv(s1), cres(c2, co(nat0, cfz, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))), wceq(co(c1, cgsu, c2), co(c1, cgsu, cv(s1))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: gsummptnn0fz

blocks.name: telgsumfzs
blocks.content: Telescoping group sum ranging over a finite set of sequential integers, using explicit substitution. (Contributed by AV, 23-Nov-2019.)

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)))

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
